nodes.text: Our troops deserved to be helped and rewarded
That's why last September when our troops were in combat in both Afghanistan and Iraq I proposed supplemental funding to support them in their missions
In the Senate only a handful of what I would call  out of the mainstream  folks -- that would be 12 senators -- voted against that legislation. Two of the 12 are my opponent and his running mate
In these crucial times our commitments have been kept by the men and women of our military.
And when these good folks are in harm's way they deserve the best pay the best equipment the best possible training.
Our troops last september were in combat
